entry.title: See you again the Lake of Clouds!

link.title: See you again the Lake of Clouds!

entry.content: Oct trip to North Michigan. Colorful leaves, beautiful lakes, and the great Lake Superior. I camped at Porcupine Mountains Wilderness State Park. Feel so lucky to come back again!
entry.summary: Oct trip to North Michigan. Colorful leaves, beautiful lakes, and the great Lake Superior. I camped at Porcupine Mountains Wilderness State Park. Feel so lucky to come back again!

entry.title: I love New Zealand!
entry.content: May trip to New Zealand. I was so lucky to have a chance to visit this beautiful country. I was so impressed by the beautiful scenery and the friendly people there. I will definitely come back again!
entry.summary: May trip to New Zealand. I was so lucky to have a chance to visit this beautiful country. I was so impressed by the beautiful scenery and the friendly people there. I will definitely come back again!
